mapper.select: SELECT id,regionId,receiveDt,type,memo,stationId,processDt,reportName,reportTel,reportAddress,longitude,latitude,typeName,result,caseId,mainEventFlag,modifyTime,startTime,acceptUnitName,acceptUnitSubRegion,code,firstTimeUnitName,videoIds,aY FROM (select ROW_NUMBER() Over(order by ${orderField} ) as rowNum, * from RegionService where ${filter}) tb where rowNum between ${fromRecord} and ${toRecord}
mapper.update: update RegionService set regionId=#{regionId}, receiveDt=#{receiveDt}, type=#{type}, memo=#{memo}, stationId=#{stationId}, processDt=#{processDt}, reportName=#{reportName}, reportTel=#{reportTel}, reportAddress=#{reportAddress}, longitude=#{longitude}, latitude=#{latitude}, typeName=#{typeName}, result=#{result}, caseId=#{caseId}, mainEventFlag=#{mainEventFlag}, modifyTime=#{modifyTime}, startTime=#{startTime}, acceptUnitName=#{acceptUnitName}, acceptUnitSubRegion=#{acceptUnitSubRegion}, code=#{code}, firstTimeUnitName=#{firstTimeUnitName}, videoIds=#{videoIds}, aY=#{aY} where id=#{id}
